name: Santa Claus Christmas Venture
description:
Help Santa Claus collect his lost Christmas presents! Freeze or avoid enemies and reach the finish line safely at the end of the level.

If the game is not running smoothly or your phone become too hot, you should change FPS to 30 (there is an option in Level Menu in upper left corner). Game runs smoothly in 60 fps on Galaxy S8 and better smartphones.

There are 3 levels, but there will be some big changes to the controls and gameplay as the game feels too hard for now
